_sText:
Have fun !! :) ssbm xmas beta5 Now it works on Orange box Engine! =============== http://www.noelshack.com/up/aac/mapsurprise-8b3ed91254.jpg You need to be in multiplayer and have atleast two players so the map doesn't automatically kills you! ======================================================================================================= Goal: Eliminate all others to be the last survivor and win 10 points. A Santa Claus on a sleigh fly and sends gifts in its path, follow it to get a gift. Beware the storm that can happen when you least imagine it will pull everyone into the middle. Left click = push ennemie (only in front of you) Use = take gift Right click = use a gift 3 gifts, Teleportation, Expulsion, big snowball 2 gifts can't be taken simultanetely Teleportation = random teleport in the map icon
Expulsion = Expulse players around you icon
big snowball = shot a big snowball in front of you icon Pushing an ennemie too near of him will result by not pushing him NOTE: If you find any bug, post them here NOTE2: to make it work better, use those commands: sv gravity 200 sv airaccelerate 100 mp limitteams 18 mp freezetime 0 NOTE3: max 18 players NOTE4: if you tele with only 2 players left it may result by killing everyone, it's a know bug that we will soon fix. NOTE5: It won't work if you play alone, it will kill you, you need to be 2 or more ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
